dcterms:description: A dataset used for choroid segmentation in Optical Coherence Tomography (OCT) images, consisting of 256 × 20 B-scans covering a 6×6 mm² region and a depth of 2 mm, with boundary information marked for 1/4 of the B-scans.
dcterms:title: AROD
